author: JK
title: Built a website
content: Today I created the index.html of my page. A website is born.

author: JK
title: Added the contact form
content: With the help of w3schools I added the contact form to my page. PHP is missing and the Google API key isn't working but it looks good, which is fine.

author: JK
title: Newsfeed is working
content: I had the idea to include a newsfeed in my website. The news are provided by a .json file which include the information. The content of said file is parsed in JavaScript on load of the index.html.

author: JK
title: Styling is done
content: With my little helper w3schools I did the styling for my page. It's nothing special but I still like it and that's what really counts. Right?

author: JK
title: Pricing page was added
content: A pricing overview has been added to my page. Buttons don't work and I have nothing to offer, but now I could if I wanted to! I think I don't have to mention that w3schools has been helping a lot writing the html and css code for this page.

author: JK
title: Footer and sidebar just got content - at least kind of
content: Today I had the glorious idea to add some content to my footer and sidebar. It's really nothing special but you can get to my CodePen dashboard via my footer and to my CSS creations via my sidebar. Yay!
